text:
Hello everyone,
first thanks for the very nice work with POI!

I noticed a bug in the latest version of POI: Version 3.1-final (2008-06-29)

When I use shape.setText(myText) If myText ends with "\r" the parameters such as RichTextRun rt rt.setFontSize(12); wont take effect.

What i have to do is to replace the last "\r" to "" then everything works.

Best regards

/Stefan Ohlsson
creator: tallstef@hotmail.com

text: Is this still an issue now? If so, can you provide a test-case that allows to reproduce this against the current version of POI?
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: No reply on request for more information, thus resolving this one for now, please reopen with more information if this is still a problem.
